fields.value:
Dear {{proposal.owner.first_name}} {{proposal.owner.last_name}},

A contract has been uploaded by the Editor for you to review. Please login using the link below to review and sign off the contract. {{base_url}}/user/proposal/{{proposal.id}}

Regards
{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: proposal_contract_author_sign_off
